text.section: The Department may adopt rules and regulations to carry out the provisions of this subtitle.

Except as this subtitle otherwise provides for a particular type of rule or regulation, a rule or regulation adopted under this subtitle may:
Impose, as circumstances require, different requirements for different pollutant sources and for different geographical areas;
Apply to sources located outside this State that cause, contribute to, or threaten environmental damage in this State; and
Make special provisions for alert and abatement standards and procedures for occurrences or emergencies of pollution or on other short term conditions that are an acute danger to health or to the environment.
